<%- Province.all.sort.each do |p| -%> <province name="<%= h(p.name) %>"> <%- p.delivery_zones.sort.each do |dz| -%> <delivery_zone name="<%= h(dz.name) %>" code="<%= h(dz.code) %>"> <%- dz.total_ideal_stock_by_package.each do |package,amount| -%> <ideal_stock for="<%= h(package.code) %>" qty="<%= amount %>" /> <%- end -%>
<%- end -%> <%- p.delivery_zones.map(&:field_coordinator).compact.sort.each do |fc| -%> <fc name="<%= h(fc.name) %>" dz="<%= h(fc.delivery_zone.code) %>" /> <%- end -%> <%- p.districts.sort.each do |d| -%> <district name="<%= h(d.name) %>"> <%- d.health_centers.sort.each do |hc| -%> <health_center population="<%= hc.catchment_population %>" code="<%= h hc.code %>" name="<%= h hc.name %>" dz="<%= h hc.delivery_zone.code %>"> <%- hc.stock_room.fridges.sort.each do |fridge| -%> <fridge code="<%= h fridge.code %>" nr="" temp="" status="" notes="" /> <%- end -%> <%- hc.ideal_stock_amounts.each do |isa| -%> <ideal_stock for="<%= isa.package.code %>" qty="<%= isa.quantity %>" /> <%- end -%>
<%- end -%>
<%- end -%>
<%- end -%>
